basic.description: This course offers a review of the characteristics of basic optical components for optical communications systems. Topics include optical fibers, light sources, optical detectors and fiber connectors; signal degradation in optical fibers, optical analog and digital communication systems; and coherent optical fiber communications.
basic.subject: EEL
basic.title: Optical Fiber Communications

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: EEL 3473 and EEL 3135. Corequisite: EEL 4021.
